content.description:
The right Cataract is a low-angle collection of flows and smears located just above, and to the right of, the summer-rock area "Guides Wall".  (Thus, also up and left of "Fireman's Area". ) 

  The more difficult ice climb "Bixler's Way" ( NEI 5) is located just up and right of the Right Cataract.   

  Also, at least two rock climbs ("Over the Hill" 5.11c, and "Sassy & Sally aka SOS") are located left of Bixler's Way. These can be found listed in the summer rock area "Fireman's Ladder".
